content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for the apartment in München.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] When did you start negotiating the price?
[Answer] I started negotiating the price when we started talking about the rental price for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] Did we agree on a final price?
[Answer] Yes, we agreed on a final price of 955 Euro.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] How would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner?
[Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as an 8.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] Did you feel discriminated or offended at any point of the negotiation?
[Answer] No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point of the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] If I felt discriminated or offended, why did I feel that way?
[Answer] However, I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang
